sourcesContent:
// react plugin used to create charts import { Line} from "react-chartjs-2"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, CardTitle, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; const Horas = ["00:00", "01:00", "02:00", "03:00", "04:00", "05:00", "06:00", "07:00", "08:00", "09:00", "10:00", "11:00", "12:00", "13:00","14:00","15:00","16:00","17:00","18:00","19:00","20:00","21:00","22:00","23:00","24:00"] var ultTemp = -100 var tempHoy = [] var cardTemp= "fas fa-thermometer-three-quarters text-primary" class Dashboard extends Component { fetchTemp=async()=>{ let aux = []; const url = "http://localhost:8080/getTempByPool=1&year=2021&month=11&day=1" let dashboardTEMPChart = { data: (canvas) => { return { labels: Horas, datasets: [ { data: tempHoy, fill: false, borderColor: "#51CACF", backgroundColor: "transparent", pointBorderColor: "#51CACF", pointRadius: 4, pointHoverRadius: 4, pointBorderWidth: 8, tension: 0.4, }, ], }; }, options: { plugins: { legend: { display: false }, }, }, }; await axios.get(url) .then(response=> { for (let index = 0; index < response.data.length; index++) { tempHoy[index] = response.data[index].temp } ultTemp = response.data[response.data.length-1].temp if (ultTemp > 22.00) { cardTemp= "fas fa-thermometer-three-quarters text-danger" } }) } render() { return ( <>

PH

0.0

Temperatura

{ultTemp}

Temperatura en Pileta

Ultimas 24 Horas
); } } export default Dashboard;
